DOC.criteria: BMI 20 38 kg/m2 Fasting glucose ≤ 126 mg/dL Blood pressure ≤ 160/100 mm Hg Presence kidney disease , liver disease , gout , hyperthyroidism , untreated unstable hypothyroidism , certain cancer , gastrointestinal disease , pancreatic disease , metabolic disease , malabsorption syndrome Use cholesterol lower medication Use medication treat hypertension le 6 month Active cardiovascular disease ( heart attack procedure within past six month participation cardiac rehabilitation program within last six month , stroke , history/treatment transient ischemic attack past six month , document history pulmonary embolus past six month ) Women give birth previous 12 month Pregnant woman woman plan become pregnant become pregnant study Lactating woman Type 2 diabetes Use prescription overthecounter antiobesity medication supplement ( e.g. , phenylpropanolamine , ephedrine , caffeine , least 6 month prior start study ) history surgical intervention obesity Smokers tobacco user ( 6 month prior start study ) History eat disorder dietary pattern consistent dietary intervention ( e.g. , vegetarian , low fat diet , high protein diet ) Known ( selfreported ) allergy adverse reaction cashew nut nut Unable unwilling give inform consent communicate study staff Selfreport alcohol substance abuse within past 12 month and/or current acute treatment rehabilitation program problem ( longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion ) Other medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment Principal Investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol
